title: CDC: Fully vaccinated students and teachers do not need to wear masks in school
content:
1. CDC: Fully vaccinated students and teachers do not need to wear masks in school  POLITICO
  2. The C.D.C. Issues New School Guidance, With Emphasis on Full Reopening  The New York Times
  3. CDC: Vaccinated teachers and students don't need masks inside school buildings  WAPT Jackson
  4. Opinion | The CDC's latest school guidelines are not perfect, but they're better than expected  The Washington Post
  5. The Latest: Asian nations add restrictions for virus surges  ABC News
